jobTitle: Working student in UX Research & Konzeption
description: I was responsible for preparing, conducting, evaluating, and documenting expert interviews and usability tests, both remotely and on-site. My tasks also included compiling results reports and client presentations. Additionally, I designed, implemented, and analyzed a quantitative study on securities trading. I supported the preparation of workshops focused on ideation and the conceptualization of digital solutions, and conducted a usability test using the heuristic evaluation method. Furthermore, I built a WordPress website using templates and performed competition analysis and desk research.
